elementSet.name: Dublin Core
elementSet.description: The Dublin Core metadata element set is common to all Omeka records, including items, files, and collections. For more information see, http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/.

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

elementText.text: The collection consists primarily of materials generated or collected by the central administrative office of Hull House Association and documents the history, leadership, activities, and mission of the organization. It also includes materials relating to the affiliates and the administrative records from two affiliate centers: the Jane Addams Center and the Uptown Center. The materials in the collection span the years from 1889 to 1999, but the bulk of material is from approximately 1963 to 1979.

element.name: Source
element.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived

element.name: Alternative Title
element.description: An alternative name for the resource. The distinction between titles and alternative titles is application-specific.

itemType.name: Text
itemType.description: A resource consisting primarily of words for reading. Examples include books, letters, dissertations, poems, newspapers, articles, archives of mailing lists. Note that facsimiles or images of texts are still of the genre Text.

element.name: Text
element.description: The transcription of the document

elementText.text:
Jan'y 1st 1895

We the undersigned hereby agree to give the sums set opposite our respective names for the current expenses of Hull House.

Jan 1 William Colvin 500 pd.
June 2" Mrs Barbara Armour 300 pd.
June 6" Seymour Coman 200 pd.
June 18" John R. Walsh $200 pd.
Oct 14"  L. J. Gage 100 pd.
June 17" Mrs George E. Adams 100 Pd.
June 18" Mrs Cyrus H. McCormick 100 Pd.
Jan 23rd Sprauge Warner & Co 100 Pd.
Jan 28" Franklin McVeagh & Co 100 Pd.
Oct 28" C. L. Hutchinson 100 Pd.
Aug 6" W. A. McConnell 100 Pd.
Sept 12" Walter C. Hately 100 Pd.
Nov 6" Mrs Joseph Bowen 750 Pd.
June 6 Enos McBarton 100 Pd.
July 6" Mary R. Smith 100 Pd.
Jan 9" Edward B. Butler 50 Pd

element.name: Original Format
element.description: The type of object, such as painting, sculpture, paper, photo, and additional data

elementSet.name: Dublin Core
elementSet.description: The Dublin Core metadata element set is common to all Omeka records, including items, files, and collections. For more information see, http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/.

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

element.name: Creator
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource

element.name: Date
element.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource

element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

elementText.text: A log of donations made to Hull-House in 1895, part of a larger account book.

element.name: Subject
element.description: The topic of the resource

element.name: Type
element.description: The nature or genre of the resource

element.name: Format
element.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

element.name: Language
element.description: A language of the resource

element.name: Rights
element.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource

element.name: Contributor
element.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource

element.name: Identifier
element.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context

elementSet.name: Monitor
elementSet.description: Metadata used to manage various status about items.

element.name: Translation Status
element.description: Status of the translation, set by the person who did the translation.

element.name: Include in Book?
element.description: Should this document be included in the print edition?

element.name: Metadata Status
element.description: Main status of metadata of the record, set by the staff member that created the document metadata/record.

element.name: Transcription Status
element.description: Status of the transcription, set by the staff member that did the initial transcription.

element.name: Transcription Difficulty
element.description: Information on the difficulty of the transcription according to the document.

element.name: Copyright Status for the Transcription
element.description: Status of the Copyright for the transcrption, set by the staff member that checked it .

element.name: Facsimile Permission Status
element.description: Status of the Facsimile Permission, set by the staff member that verified it.

element.name: Publish Record
element.description: Publish record except if the field is set to "No".

element.name: Publish Images
element.description: Publish images except if the field is set to "No".

element.name: Publish Transcription
element.description: Publish the transcription except if the field is set to "No".
